citations.narrative:
The facility keeps a count of the adult animals on hand, however has not kept an updated record of the animals born and
raised/owned in the closed colony. Update records can be important for animal husbandry tracking. An inventory record of
animals on hand must be kept and to include animals born and owned at the facility and needs to be kept up to date.
Ensure that a regular updated record of animals on hand (to include animals acquired, owned, held/leased, transported,
born, sold, euthanized or otherwise disposed of) is kept and available for inspection.
***Correct by 2/17/2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The facility keeps a count of the adult animals on hand, however has not kept an updated record of the animals born and 
raised/owned in the closed colony. Update records can be important for animal husbandry tracking. An inventory record of 
animals on hand must be kept and to include animals born and owned at the facility and needs to be kept up to date. 
Ensure that a regular updated record of animals on hand (to include animals acquired, owned, held/leased, transported, 
born, sold, euthanized or otherwise disposed of) is kept and available for inspection.  
***Correct by 2/17/2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
